title: Hatchy
author: Hatchy
content: As we Nigerians sabi, this yahoo yahoo wey our youth don turn to daily work don dey too much. Many of us get brothers or even sisters wey dey into this matter, and I no think say dem go stop anytime soon. Dis yahoo yahoo matter don kill many of our youths, some sef don dey kolo for street sake of say dem dey enjoy people sweat. If I remember well, dis yahoo matter don dey around for a while, but na recently na e cast Wella as boys begin carry am dey everywhere. E get plenty reasons why dem enter this thing including1. Impatience2.greed3. Intimidation4.depression with many others and I no go blame dem well well because our government no dey organized at all. I go still blame some parents wey no fit guide their pikin well and con leave dem to do bad things, some even dey force them into the matter because of their personal gain. Plenty of these boys don kill almost all their friends, parents, siblings, girlfriends, all because of money, cars, and other earthly things wey no dey last. Dem dey forget say any tin wey devil give you no dey last, and e go still collect your life join. Me I still dey reason say, if them manage last reach old age, how dem wan take ensure say this work go help dem take care of their family? Na just yesterday, one house for my area wey don tay, na so I hear say the yahoo guy don sell the house because money no dey to finish am. no be every day you go see person thief, but these boys no dey hear and try save dem money for better thing other than woman and club. I even hear one guy talk the other day Quotee no get as e wan be, fo this yahoo matter we die hereMy only question now be say, as dem dey do all these things dey show the younger generations, which example dem dey set for dem? Because as e be now, yahoo don turn work for our country, and e no get how e go be, the new generation go still put hand for this matter. My people, abeg watin una see for this matter?

Non of my brothers or sisters dey do yahoo yahoo, but I don't no why dis new generation people need quick money in a wrong way, and if u look at it very well u will discover dat is only lazy family dat is encouraging their sons and daughters to continue doing dis tin u called yahoo yahoo. If u have any brother or sister wey dey do yahoo yahoo just try to encourage dem by  refer dem to some areas were dey can get BTC books to study so dat dey will have knowledge of BTC and it will also help dem to quit from such bad attitude in d society.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: The truth be say Nigeria culture support rituals and na the major problem be that. No be today yahoo don start or rituals. I remember when I small then,you go see people wey dey do 419 and anything wey involve to deceive person collect him hard earned money through trick must lead to bloodshed either directly or indirectly. Na wetin still dey go on now,kidnappers,ritualist,Arm robbers all bad means of getting money wey boiz dey do,them go put am for yahoo because them see say the society no see yahoo as bad thing since government no provide job for the citizens. Even if enough job dey,some lazy people go still commit all those crimes wey I mention above because them won get quick money. Everything wey dey happen now don happen before na just only the name them change to yahoo. Nothing new dey again

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Quote from: Hatchy on August 01, 2023, 03:48:37 PMAs we Nigerians sabi, this yahoo yahoo wey our youth don turn to daily work don dey too much. Many of us get brothers or even sisters wey dey into this matter, and I no think say dem go stop anytime soon.You can’t generalize it that everyone has a brother or sister that’s into yahoo. If it’s persistent in a part or area of the state or country, it doesn’t mean it’s everywhere and every family will have a member involved in such act. As far as I know, they’re more youths outside that are not involved in yahoo than those that are into it now, even though the number is increasing everyday.Quote from: Hatchy on August 01, 2023, 03:48:37 PME get plenty reasons why dem enter this thing including1. Impatience2.greed3. Intimidation4.depression with many othersAll this that you’ve mentioned are part of everyday lives that you just have to make up your mind that they don’t get into you and control your emotions or imaginations. It’ll gradually kill your sense of reasoning and make you do things you’re not suppose to do as a human being. You’ll definitely go illegal if you can’t control yourself with the pressure of all this.Quote from: Hatchy on August 01, 2023, 03:48:37 PMMy only question now be say, as dem dey do all these things dey show the younger generations, which example dem dey set for dem? Because as e be now, yahoo don turn work for our country, and e no get how e go be, the new generation go still put hand for this matter. My people, abeg watin una see for this matter?They’re setting bad examples to the younger ones and until the government brings more stringent punishment for the culprits we might see a decline in youths involvement in that. The government also have to play a vital role in providing more works for the youths to engage in because lack of work and lots of depression can lead one astray.

Many of us get brothers or even sisters wey dey into this matter, and I no think say dem go stop anytime soon. Like person don already relate for you, this sort of generalization no go well. No be say the people way Dey into the thing no be person pikin, brothers or sisters but, some of us feel insulted when you put an like that especially, when e happen say e no be as you talk for our end. Make we try no Dey generalize matter like that. Na things like this dey make these Oyibo people believe say our naija people na 419 or wayo people and if you leave am like that without saying anything, e go stick. Meanwhile, you and me know say, na just some people dey spoil the good name and e be like that for every country. E no get where bad people no dey and e even worst for outside pass watin we dey see for here.Quote and I no go blame dem well well because our government no dey organized at all. I go still blame some parents wey no fit guide their pikin well and con leave dem to do bad things, some even dey force them into the matter because of their personal gain.Na this I no go blame them make matter cast o. Blame them if you must because, there are other options and no be only them dey go through one or two but, na the life then chose, the way them chose to escape their own.

comments.body: Yahoo Yahoo no dey set example 4 any generations rather, dem dey folo the examples as footsteps of our past & present political leaders.My differentiate their differences.Our political leaders dey thief, embezzle, launder our monies & dem dey disguise us as needies to the up up worldly international levels say we need help, dem dey use our profiles borrow money, dem dey us get compensative monies from the national and international levels.Them dey set confusions on us the common masses whereby we fight ourselves, kill ourselves all to set out minds off from goin for our rights. Dem dey use d poors 4 thugery, dem dey do bloodie rituals to achieve all these where by d more the d masses fight as them spiritually & physically structure am, so more monies dem get.All these na fraudulents & ritualities.May I tell u say nowadays scams & succeeded in frauding on a start where some legal professional and executive representatives gave out d key words to these guys? Yahoo na offspring of our political monetary pocketing system.Only say the politicians b like legal fraudsters and legal rituals way be say if hand catch dem, na celebrate dem dey celebrate dem by if the boys of the street dey catched, na illegal prosecution charge dem dey get.Now e don dey trend say if u want dey free after u tiff, tiff somtin big cuz if tiff small 1 na die u dey.This na y our politicians dey go free after caught and this so yahoo yahoo guys if govts as a security bodies catch d, dem dey use money make their pass and as time goes, this so big shoot yahoo guys get celebrated 4 societies & the security agencies dey twaley 4 them at checking points.The systems of govt way fail to cut the heads of it's any corrupted bodies, the e spreads all over as illness to the whole bodies.If we want do away frauds as scams, make we start am with the legal big shots way be politicians then the street ones go dey easy to tackle if not, as long as the political leaders remains on charged to their governing system, so as yahoo yahoo as it's offsprings too com to stay.My tell una, if thief catches thief, dem dey get agreement to keep themselves the secrets secret else one get exposed e affect the other.I no support yahoo yahoo but our political leaders do worse than this yahoo guys.Na even we the masses dey cause ourselves some setbacks cus we lie too low on our top leaders way no even send us than our fellow poor neighbors way no even get yet we develop hatreds within ourselves.Dem do us?

comments.body: Omo I no sure this our generation go gree repent or dey hardworking again, the only be say we wey be parents, guardians, elders etc, na we the destiny of our next generation lies in our hand because we go need to dey very very hand working to set goals for them, to create awareness say no be street na e life dey like as yahoo dey like this, plenty people believe say na the only means of surviving or kidnapping, stealing but we go prove them wrong. comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Everything fall back to the economy and the behaviors of our government, assuming they are doing their work as supposed, all this wouldn't have happened but rather they use their corruption to infect the minds of our citizens indirectly and now they are trying to fight against it. It's obvious they can't stop it, because some youths have already come to a conclusion that this is the way and nothing else. Assuming we had a balanced economy where jobs are available, I don't think this amount of youths would likely fall for this cheap wickedness. However let pray things get better, else even the next generation would likely follow this same part.
